# React Components

This guide provides the conventions for building React components in the `web` package.

## When to use this skill

Use this skill when you're asked to build a new component or update an existing one in the `web` package.

## Conventions

- Prefer data attributes over conditional classes. See [Condtional Styles](./conditional-styles.jsx) for examples.
